org.jacp.javafx.rcp.componentLayout

Class FXMLPerspectiveLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacp.javafx.rcp.util.Checkable
      • org.jacp.javafx.rcp.componentLayout.PerspectiveLayout
        • org.jacp.javafx.rcp.componentLayout.FXMLPerspectiveLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPerspectiveLayout<javafx.scene.Node,javafx.scene.Node>

    public class FXMLPerspectiveLayout
extends PerspectiveLayout
    Configuration handler for perspective components, used in handle method for configuration and registration of layout 'leaves' where subcomponents can live in. Create your own complex layout, the root node is defined by FXML definition. Mark your leaf nodes as privet @FXML components and register them.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek

      void registerRootComponent(javafx.scene.Node comp)
      Set Layout-Wrapper for perspective; this wrapper contains wrappers for editors and views, define a valid component which is valid to hold subcomponents.
